description.value:
Temple Keeper

You served for a time in the temple of your god. You have delved into the mysteries of your faith, offering spiritual guidance to others. You’ve also learned how to carry out a number of basic religious rites and how to invoke your god’s divine protection in times of dire need.

Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom, Charisma, or Intelligence score increases by 1. Your Wisdom, Charisma, or Constitution score increases by 1.

Prayer of Protection. You can cast the spell Protection from Evil and Good without expending a spell slot using this feature. Whenever you do so, you can’t use this feature again until you finish a long rest. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.YEVCJVPUXY9662ZG]{Prayer of Protection}

Skills. Choose one from: History, Insight, Medicine, Performance, Persuasion, Religion.

Tools. You gain proficiency with an artisan’s tool or a musical instrument.

Languages. Two of your choice.
